component.name: sleek
component.summary: Todo app based on the todo.txt format for Linux, free and open-source

description.p: sleek is an open-source todo app that makes use of the todo.txt format. sleeks GUI is modern and simple but still offers a decent set of functions which help users getting things done. sleek is available as a client for Windows, MacOS and Linux.
Users can add contexts, projects, priorities, due dates, recurrences or threshold dates to their todos. These todo.txt attributes can then be used as filters or to group and sort the todo list.

sleek manages and watches multiple todo.txt files continuously for changes, which makes it easy to integrate sleek with other todo.txt apps. Also users can switch between bright and dark mode and choose from multiple languages.

Todos with due date or repeating todos will trigger notifications and completed todos can be hidden or archived into separate done.txt files. If users have tons of todos, a compact view can come in handy.

ul.li: An existing todo.txt file can be used or a new one can be created
Todos can be added, edited, marked as complete (and vice versa) or deleted
A todo can be hidden but its attributes will be available in the filter drawer and autocomplete function (https://github.com/ransome1/sleek/wiki/Hidden-todos)
Dark and light mode can be toggled
A compact view is available
Completed todos can be bulk archived to a separate done.txt ([name of todo file]_done.txt) file
Completed todos can be shown or hidden
Todos can be enriched, sorted and grouped by contexts, projects, start dates, due dates
Multi line todos can be created
Todos can have a due date
Due dates will trigger alarms and show counter badges
Todos can repeat themselves (https://github.com/ransome1/sleek/wiki/Recurring-todos)
Threshold dates can be set (https://github.com/ransome1/sleek/wiki/Deferred-todos-(t:))
Available contexts and projects will be suggested according to your input
Todos can be filtered by contexts and projects
Filters can be renamed or deleted by right clicking on them
Filters are sorted alphanummerically
Todos can be looked up by using filter expressions (https://github.com/ransome1/sleek/wiki/FIlter-Expressions-for-Advanced-Search)
Hyperlinks are detected automatically and can be clicked using the icon
Alarms will be triggered when a todo is due tomorrow or today
Todos that include either contexts or projects can be shown or hidden entirely
A file watcher rereads the file if it has been changed
Multiple todo.txt files can be managed and switched between using a tab bar or keyboard shortcuts
Multiple languages are automatically detected or set by hand to German, English, Italian, Spanish, French, Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Brazilian Portugese, Japanese, Turkish and Hungarian
sleek can be minimized to tray
Tabindex available
Existing todos can be used as templates for new ones
Keyboard shortcuts following todotxt.net (https://github.com/ransome1/sleek/wiki/Keyboard-shortcuts)
